title: Ultrawide Not Working
body:
Hello,

I installed the files in the game folder and when I started up the game it is still locked to 16:9. In game resolution is set to 3440x1440
and windowing is set to fullscreen. I kept the ini file the same so the x,y res values are 0. This is the demo version if that makes a difference.

Thanks!
author: bcarvalho2500

comments.body: You need to use version 0.7.4 its the latest one that works for the demo.

satisfaction_conditions: Addresses compatibility with the demo version of the game
Explains why ultrawide resolution settings aren't taking effect despite correct configuration

title: Trojan detected
body:
Trojan detected on file: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\FINAL FANTASY XVI\FFXVIFix.asi

Trojan:Win32/Wacatac.B!ml
author: Go2v

comments.body: It's a false positive, as detailed in #27 and #25. You can allow it in your anti-virus software and then redownload.
Ok, thank you very much for your work, you really saved the game with your responsiveness to enable the ultrawide, thank you very much!

satisfaction_conditions: Confirmation that the detected threat is a false positive
Clear guidance on resolving the antivirus conflict

title: Windows cannot find unable to load game.
body: I'm having an error with the steam version.  I put the command in and it sends back an error.  Windows cannot find WINEDLLOVERRIDE="dinput8=n,b".  I maybe just stupid from being sick but can't figure out for the life of me what is wrong.
author: ResuTheRunning

comments.body: You don't need to use that launch command on windows. It's only for Linux/Steam Deck. If you remove it and try to launch the game, it should work.
That was it.  Too sick for brain to work right.  Thank you.  Me are not paying attention big dumb. XD

satisfaction_conditions: Identifies that the command is unnecessary for Windows systems
